subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Opening day is a ritual of innocence: every team is in first place, every team makes a fresh start. Except in New York, where Mets fans bravely face a new season with optimism and dread.
snippet: Opening day is a ritual of innocence: every team is in first place, every team makes a fresh start. Except in New York, where Mets fans bravely face a new season with optimism and dread.
